SEARCH
Package application

Class StudentCommittee

java.lang.Object
application.User
application.Student
application.StudentCommittee
All Implemented Interfaces:
StudentCampOptions, SuggestionEditor, SuggestionView
public class StudentCommittee extends Student implements SuggestionView, SuggestionEditor
This class houses all the required variables and methods relevant to a Student Committee member.
All Students should be constructed as a StudentCommittee, and then immediately upcast as a Student.
This is to reflect the fact that all Students have the option to be a StudentCommittee member, while also retaining their Student status for all other camps.

  • Constructor Details

    • StudentCommittee

      public StudentCommittee(String name, String id, String faculty, String password, int committee)
      Constructor for StudentCommittee. Fills in a null object for camp for the time being.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of Student
      id - StudentID (NTU email prefix)
      faculty - Student faculty
      password - Hashed password
      committee - CampID of camp student is committee of.

  • Method Details

    • getCamp

      public Camp getCamp()
      Fetch the Camp object that the StudentCommittee is part of
      Returns:
      Camp Object that the Student is committee member of

    • setCamp

      public void setCamp(Camp camp)
      Set the Camp object that the StudentCommittee is part of
      Should only be used to set a StudentCommittee's camp from null to a camp
      Parameters:
      camp - Camp object to assign to the StudentCommittee

    • addPoints

      public void addPoints(int score)
      Adds an amount of points to the StudentCommittee's score. Can be negative. Called for the following instances:
      +1 for enquiry answered
      +1 for suggestion made
      +1 for suggestion accepted
      -1 for suggestion deleted
      Parameters:
      score - Points to be added

    • getPoints

      public int getPoints()
      Fetch the score that the StudentCommittee is sitting on
      Returns:
      Integer score of the StudentCommittee member

    • adminMenu

      default void adminMenu(List<Camp> campList, User activeUser, List<Suggestion> suggestionList, List<Enquiry> enquiryList)
      This method displays and resolves the options for the Admin menu.
      In the main CAMs menu, a check must be done to ensure Student accounts don't call for this method.
      This menu behaves differently based on whether the ActiveUser is a Staff or a StudentCommittee.
      Parameters:
      campList - List of all Camps. Used in parsing camps that are available for the user to perform admin actions on.
      activeUser - User object of the active user.
      suggestionList - List of all Suggestions. Used to save the state of Suggestions.
      enquiryList - List of all Enquiries. Used to save the state of Enquiries.
